articles.description: The Imagination Library, launched in 1995, delivers one free book a month to children from birth to age 5 who are enrolled in the program.
articles.content: TACOMA, Wash. Dolly Partons rhinestone-covered life and career have captivated imaginations the world over for the past six decades. And its imagination that brought the iconic entertainer to Washing… [+2535 chars]

articles.title: One Punch Man gets a spectacular homage in Hulu’s Miguel Wants to Fight - Polygon
articles.description: Watch the full One Punch Man sequence from Miguel Wants to Fight, as the characters get an anime makeover. The movie hits Netflix on Aug. 16.
articles.content: Miguel Wants to Fight, the comedy arriving on Hulu this week, is beautifully straightforward in its intentions. Its the story of a high schooler, Miguel (Tyler Dean Flores), who wants to get into a f… [+933 chars]
